divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching TV and looked out my back window, at first it appeared to look like a aluminum balloon so i figured well no big deal but as i watched the object it began to move erratically so i stepped outside to take a closer look and witnessed several disk shaped objects that were at first stationary then appeared to climb so now I'm thinking birds but then one of them started following a plane that was descending most likely headed to nearby Ontario airport then within well i guess i blink of the eye the object that was following the plane moved back into formation with the other objects it must have traveled over five miles in less than one second i captured faint objects my camera but nothing to write home about anyway the object towards the right lower section of the photo is the plane the object towards to top left is the one that stated following the plane,I will watch the skies tonight to see if any return i will be ready this time.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Moreno Valley
